WorkItem.Description:
decade display mode presents current decade with gray one year before (top left corner) and one year after (bottom rigth corner)
when u select, no metter, one of this year (one before or after) u reproduce bug:
 
little intoduce: 
- 2009 is last year in present decade.
- display decade
- select 2010 year
 
calendar action:
- calendar will change decate (DisplayModeChanged event is fired (?) but why, we were change time period not display mode)
- calendar select the same position of 2010 in prev view (decade with 2009) - 2020 in fact !!
- calendar display 2020 year(!) not selected 2010
 
conclusion:
in Decade display mode when u select one year before/after decade (visable as light gray) u get selected year sub/add 10 years
WorkItem.Summary: Calendar: selecting year in decade display mode

Comments.Message: Hello DoNetDancer, which version of toolkit are you using? We had this issue in earlier versions of toolkit, but should be fixed in latest. Please verify and let us know.
